the trick is to combine both lines.  I just tried it and it works, 
just make sure there are no spaces:

Paste this: 

http://www02.quizyourfriends.com/scoreboard.php?

Then this:

quizname=040207035941-~p27Sengoku

and end with this:

~p20Clans~p27~p20quiz&c=0&a=18

Yahoo always butchers these things.


--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, Dave Jackson <nihontonut@s...> 
wrote:
> Wont work I tried several diferent combinations of cutting and 
pasting.
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Kitsuno 
>   To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Saturday, February 07, 2004 1:04 AM
>   Subject: [samuraihistory] 'SENGOKU CLANS' quiz
> 
> 
>   I just made a quiz to go along with the others. It centers mostly 
on 
>   clan genealogy, so it is probably pretty tough, but should be 
>   interesting.  It is accurate to the best of my knowledge (my 
>   disclaimer)
> 
>   YOU WILL PROBABLY HAVE TO CUT AND PASTE EACH PART OF THE URL 
>   SEPERATELY:
> 
>   http://www02.quizyourfriends.com/scoreboard.php?
quizname=040207035941-
>   ~p27Sengoku~p20Clans~p27~p20quiz&c=0&a=18
> 
>   (THIS TAKES YOU TO THE 'RANKS' PAGE - CLICK THE 'TAKE THIS QUIZ' 
LINK 
>   TO TAKE QUIZ)
